divs: Sighting DetailsI reported 2 sightings a few days ago, since then, I see the objects every night, they are in different areas every night, I shared somephotos, and videos with you that I sent to dropbox. do you know whats going on, I see them every night, please get back to me.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Livonia
There were no other sightings in Livonia on or around August 24th 2013
Summary: I saw an orange red object for a couple minutes moving from the s/e to the west
